The AFL advises the Match Review for the Sunday games of Round Three has been completed. Three charges were laid.
Charges Laid:Rory Lobb, Fremantle, has been charged with making Unreasonable or Unne… [+1474 chars]

articles.author: Roy Masters
articles.title: Six again rule quickly separating contenders from pretenders - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Speed is of the essence for NRL sides under the new conventions this season, and the chasm is already widening between those who have it and those who don't.
articles.content: The weekend results, after only four rounds of a resumed season, dont establish a trend. However, when top teams played each other, the scores were relatively low and close (Panthers 21 Storm 14; Roo… [+3431 chars]
